title: Inc fed funds rate effect on USD value, Xn

content.question: Assume that the United States central bank conducts monetary policy with the goal of increasing the federal funds rate. How will the increase in the federal funds rate affect the value of the United States dollar on the foreign exchange market and United States exports?

choices.label: The value of the dollar will increase, and <math alttext="U.S." overflow="scroll"><mtext>U.S.</mtext></math> exports will decrease.
The value of the dollar will not change, and <math alttext="U.S." overflow="scroll"><mtext>U.S.</mtext></math> exports will decrease.
The value of the dollar will decrease, and <math alttext="U.S." overflow="scroll"><mtext>U.S.</mtext></math> exports will decrease.
The value of the dollar will decrease, and <math alttext="U.S." overflow="scroll"><mtext>U.S.</mtext></math> exports will increase.
The value of the dollar will increase, and <math alttext="U.S." overflow="scroll"><mtext>U.S.</mtext></math> exports will increase.

content.answer: The value of the dollar will increase, and <math alttext="U.S." overflow="scroll"><mtext>U.S.</mtext></math> exports will decrease.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
